description.@en: You are socially awkward and donâ€™t get along well with others. You often stammer, lose focus and find it hard to compel others to listen to you. As such, you are perceived as being socially inept at times, or haughty without reason. You may even have a brain trauma! You decide.

effect.@en: Whenever you suffer mental Peril, move one additional step down the Peril Condition Track negatively while suffering 1 Corruption.
